title: Problem-Solving Skill Enhancement Course through Game-Based Elementary Geometry Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Gamified content learning via smartphone-based LMS followed by project submission

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain elementary geometry concepts at 80% or higher accuracy through game-based activities
Learners can solve spatial reasoning problems in digital game environments at 85% or higher accuracy for three consecutive attempts
Learners can present the process of solving real-world problems through geometric modeling via team projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
